data.title: Benjamin Hastings III (1728-1806)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Benjamin Hastings III born 1728 Deerfield, Hampshire, Massachusetts Bay Colony died 1806 Greenfield, Hampshire, Massachusetts, USA including ancestors + descendants + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Benjamin Hastings III

Born 18 Dec 1728 in Deerfield, Hampshire, Massachusetts Bay Colony

Ancestors

Son of Benjamin Hastings II and Prudence (Smith) Hastings

Husband of Mary (Potter) Hastings — married 14 May 1751 in Deerfield, Hampshire, Massachusetts Bay Colony

Descendants

Died 21 Jan 1806 at age 77 in Greenfield, Hampshire, Massachusetts, USA

Profile last modified 16 Jan 2021 | Created 12 Jan 2015

This page has been accessed 497 times.

Biography

Benjamin Hastings was born in Deerfield, Massachusetts on 7 Dec 1728. He was the son of Benjamin Hastings and Prudence Smith. [1]

Benjamin and Mary "Porter" were married in Deerfield, Massachusetts on May 14, 1751. [2]

Lieut. Benjamin died on passed away Jan. 21, 1806, age 77, in Greenfield, Massachusetts [3] and is buried at High Street Cemetery in Greenfield. [4]

Sources

↑ "Massachusetts Births and Christenings, 1639-1915", database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:VQXL-FMG : 15 January 2020), Benjamin Hastings, 1728.

↑ Deerfield - Marriages - Massachusetts Vital Records

↑ Greenfield - Deaths - Massachusetts Vital Records

↑ Find a Grave, database and images (https://www.findagrave.com : accessed 15 January 2021), memorial page for Lieut Benjamin Hastings (7 Dec 1728–21 Jan 1806), Find A Grave: Memorial #57099868, citing High Street Cemetery, Greenfield, Franklin County, Massachusetts, USA ; Maintained by John Hastings (contributor 47336832) .
